languages.text: "Молчать! Вы совсем, видать, озверели. Кучка скорбных умом грешников, возомнивших себя вершителями правосудия! Кого вам судить? Вам только страдать и каяться до конца жизни!"

traits.locale_text: "Молчать!" {n}Священник, какое-то время молчавший, воздевает посох.{/n} "Вы совсем, видать, озверели. Кучка скорбных умом грешников, возомнивших себя вершителями правосудия! Кого вам судить? Вам только страдать и каяться до конца жизни!"

languages.text: "Silence! You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted reprobates who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgement on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"
languages.original_text: "Молчать! Вы совсем, видать, озверели. Кучка скорбных умом грешников, возомнивших себя вершителями правосудия! Кого вам судить? Вам только страдать и каяться до конца жизни!"

traits.locale_text: "Silence!" {n}The priest, who remained silent for a while, raises his staff.{/n} "You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted sinners who think themselves bringers of justice! What judgment do you deserve to give? All you ought to do is suffer and repent till the end of your days!"

"Silence!" {n}The priest, who remained silent for a while, raises his staff.{/n} "You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted sinners who think themselves bringers of justice! What judgment do you deserve to give? All you ought to do is suffer and repent till the end of your days!"

"Silence!" {n}The priest, who has remained silent up to now, raises his staff.{/n} "You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted sinners who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgment on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"

"Silence!" {n}The priest, who has remained silent up to now, raises his staff.{/n} "You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted sinners who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgment on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"

"Silence! You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted reprobates who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgement on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"

languages.text: 「静かに！皆、完全に正気を失ってしまったのか。自分たちが正義の執行者だと思い込んでいる、嘆かわしいほど頭の悪い不届き者の集まりに過ぎん！なんの権限で人々を裁いておるのだ？お前たちがすべきことは死ぬまで苦しみ、悔い改めることではないか！」
languages.original_text: "Silence! You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted reprobates who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgement on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"

traits.locale_text: 「静かに！皆、完全に正気を失ってしまったのか。自分たちが正義の執行者だと思い込んでいる、嘆かわしいほど頭の悪い不届き者の集まりに過ぎん！なんの権限で人々を裁いておるのだ？お前たちがすべきことは死ぬまで苦しみ、悔い改めることではないか！」

languages.text: “闭嘴！我看你们简直是疯了，你们这群蠢得可怜的恶棍，自以为你们是在行使正义！你们有什么资格对别人评头论足？你们应该做的就是受苦、忏悔，直到生命结束为止！”
languages.original_text: "Silence! You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted reprobates who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgement on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"

traits.locale_text: “闭嘴！我看你们简直是疯了，你们这群蠢得可怜的恶棍，自以为你们是在行使正义！你们有什么资格对别人评头论足？你们应该做的就是受苦、忏悔，直到生命结束为止！”

languages.text: «¡Silencio! Habéis perdido todos la cabeza. ¡Sois un hatajo de ignorantes chiflados que se creen portadores de justicia! ¿Quiénes sois vosotros para juzgar a nadie? ¡Mejor limitaos a arrepentiros hasta el fin de vuestros días!».
languages.original_text: "Silence! You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted reprobates who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgement on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Silencio! Habéis perdido todos la cabeza. ¡Sois un hatajo de ignorantes chiflados que se creen portadores de justicia! ¿Quiénes sois vosotros para juzgar a nadie? ¡Mejor limitaos a arrepentiros hasta el fin de vuestros días!».

languages.text: « Silence ! Vous avez tous perdu la tête. Vous n'êtes qu'une bande de réprouvés et d'imbéciles qui se prennent pour des champions de la justice ! De quel droit vous permettez-vous de juger qui que ce soit ? Vous devriez plutôt souffrir et vous repentir pour vos péchés jusqu'à la fin de vos jours ! »
languages.original_text: "Silence! You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted reprobates who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgement on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"

traits.locale_text: « Silence ! Vous avez tous perdu la tête. Vous n'êtes qu'une bande de réprouvés et d'imbéciles qui se prennent pour des champions de la justice ! De quel droit vous permettez-vous de juger qui que ce soit ? Vous devriez plutôt souffrir et vous repentir pour vos péchés jusqu'à la fin de vos jours ! »

languages.text: "Ruhe! Habt Ihr völlig den Verstand verloren? Ein Haufen erschreckend dummer Schurken schwingt sich zu Vertretern der Gerechtigkeit auf! Wer seid Ihr, um über andere ein Urteil zu fällen? Ihr solltet alle in Stille leiden und bis ans Ende Eurer Tage bereuen!"
languages.original_text: "Silence! You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted reprobates who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgement on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"

traits.locale_text: "Ruhe! Habt Ihr völlig den Verstand verloren? Ein Haufen erschreckend dummer Schurken schwingt sich zu Vertretern der Gerechtigkeit auf! Wer seid Ihr, um über andere ein Urteil zu fällen? Ihr solltet alle in Stille leiden und bis ans Ende Eurer Tage bereuen!"

languages.text: "Sessizlik! Aklınızı peynir ekmekle yemişsiniz. Zekâ yoksunu üç beş kendini bilmez, adalet savaşçılığına soyunmuş! Birilerini yargılamak size mi düştü? Sizin yapmanız gereken şey, hayatınızın sonuna kadar ızdırap çekip tövbe etmek!"
languages.original_text: "Silence! You must be completely out of your minds. A band of woefully dim-witted reprobates who think themselves bringers of justice! Who are you to pass judgement on anyone? All you ought to be doing is suffering and repenting till the end of your days!"

traits.locale_text: "Sessizlik! Siz aklınızı tamamen kaçırmış olmalısınız. Acıklı derecede zekâ yoksunu birkaç serseri kendilerinin adalet savaşçısı olduğunu sanıyor! Birilerini yargılamak size mi düştü? Sizin yapmanız gereken şey hayatınızın sonuna kadar acı çekmek ve tövbe etmek!"
